titles.title: To prohibit any use of eminent domain authority by the United States to expand the Pinon Canyon Maneuver Site in southeastern Colorado.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary: 4/20/2010--Introduced. Prohibits either the Secretary of Defense (DOD) or the Army from using eminent domain authority to expand the Pinon Canyon Maneuver Site in southeastern Colorado.
